subject: Power Supply for Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor
description_text:
Hello, 
 
 I would like to inquire whether the device comes with a power connection suitable for use in Germany, or if an adapter for German sockets is included. 
 Thank you very much in advance for your assistance. I look forward to your reply. 
 
 Kind regards, 
 Marvin

conversations.body_text: Hi Marvin Krzon,  We usually include the appropriate power plug based on the destination country. You can also leave a note on your order specifying the plug type you need.
